TopicTitle: Put an insane amount of objects in orbit around Kerbin

Articles.Content: I\'ve been launching every rocket I make into orbit (if it gets that far) I want to fill up the sky with debris/orbiters. I think it would be funny to see Kerbin surrounded by a sea of space trash. Its a simple challenge, just put orbiters up and later on post what you have done. I think this can be done with only stock parts, agree?

After you get all that debris, then you need something like the Sunbeam Laser [http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6452.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6452.0) clear out all that stuff. This game just gets deeper and deeper.
